title: Thunderbird 115 still using the same old UI not showing the latest updated card view.
content: Hi Team, I download the latest update i.e. 115 for the official web site but new ui isn't reflecting. please help. I loved the new UI Supernova but even after installing the latest version I am not able to use it. it is still showing the email in the old way.
creator: mailtodeepak70
